name: AMS Consulting
tag_list: data-collection, inventory-and-inspection-of-assets, asset-reporting, geographical-information-systems, facilities-management, sustainability, leed-certification, pavement-management-systems, asset-management-systems, robert-estimo, gis, mobile-mapping
overview: AMS Consulting is a specialized consulting company helping organizations in the private and public sector optimize the useful life of their assets utilizing state-of-the-art technology and best management practices. We consider ourselves as a total solution company that offers a wide spectrum of specialized services such as: data collection, inventory and inspection of assets; asset reporting; geographical information systems; facilities management; sustainability and LEED certification: and implementation of software from pavement management systems to full suite enterprise asset management systems.
